author: STRamsay
title: Awesome train set beautifully designed
review: This is one of if not my very favourite train sets. It exceeds many other highly prized sets by far in my opinion. Lego had there ducks in a row when they did the "My Own Train" theme and then marketed add-on light function and separate sealed bag brick sets specially designed for the locomotives and tenders in a wide variety of colours. Just amazingly fun to build but nothing close to getting two of these guys set up in tandem and pulling some loaded wagons!!! Cheers
